text:
—In the darkness.
Someone's voice called out to me.

What was in the direction of the voice was...
A rugged, middle-aged lion with a sturdy physique.

I hadn't seen his face in a long time...
And I would never see it again.
My only blood relative.

name: Gnomon
text:
M-mas... Master?!
Why...

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Why, you ask...?
I was so worried about you,
I couldn't rest even in death, so I came.

name: Gnomon
text:
...I apologize.
As your disciple... as the successor to the "Great Wizard".
I am nothing but useless.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
—That's not true, Gnomon.
As a "Great Wizard",
you've been more than capable.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
I'm not worried about you as your master...
I'm worried about you as a parent.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
I should have told you repeatedly while I was alive...
But you never understood.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
There's nothing to apologize for.
...You're still carrying some worries, aren't you?

name: Gnomon
text:
.........
Master, you're amazing.
As expected, you see everything.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Actually, in order to close the "rift",
and to fully carry out that mission—

name: Gnomon
text:
Not only the Heroes...
But there's a possibility that I, too,
may have to leave this universe.

name: Gnomon
text:
As Master already knows... even if I leave this universe...
As long as the "rift" is open,
I can still communicate with the "grimoire".

name: Gnomon
text:
However... if the "rift" closes.
It's uncertain if I can use the "grimoire" from outside the universe.
It's better to assume it's impossible.

name: Gnomon
text:
If that happens, I won't just lose most of my "magic".
I won't even be able to return to this universe.

Master said nothing. He narrowed his eyes...
And looked at me with an unreadable expression,
just as he was back then.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Of course, I could remain in this universe,
and send the Heroes off from the ground.

name: Gnomon
text:
However... in that case.
I wouldn't be able to deal with unforeseen circumstances,
nor witness the outcome.

name: Gnomon
text:
...There's also the option of escaping this universe,
and following the Heroes back to their original universe.

name: Gnomon
text:
But if I were to do that... this time,
the existence of the "Great Wizard"
would vanish from this world.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
...Then, you.
What do you think about that?

name: Gnomon
text:
...The "Great Wizard" is an entity that has
inherited the "grimoire" through generations
in order to guide the Heroes.

name: Gnomon
text:
However, at the same time... for thousands of years,
it has also been the entity that has protected
the highest-grade "grimoire" in this world.

name: Gnomon
text:
My leaving this world means...
This tradition would be broken, and at the same time,
a considerable amount of "magic" would be lost from this world.

name: Gnomon
text:
Considering this world will continue its restoration
after averting the crisis...
I believe it would be too great a loss.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
...That's not it.
What "you" yourself want to do.
That's what I want to know.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Not your thoughts as the "Great Wizard".
Your thoughts as a single human being, "Gnomon".

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
...Up until now,
you've been traveling with the Heroes, haven't you?

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
During that time... what did you think?
After seeing the world and spending time with the Heroes.
What did you feel?

name: Gnomon
text:
...You wished for it, didn't you?
During the journey to close the "rift"...
that you would meet good "comrades".

name: Gnomon
text:
...Indeed.
I, too, was able to meet them.
People who would call me their "comrade".

name: Gnomon
text:
...It was the first time.
I had met people who would talk to me so intimately.

name: Gnomon
text:
It was the first time I had met people who made me feel...
so reassured and at ease just by being with them...

name: Gnomon
text:
The thought of not being able to meet these people
once my mission is over...
makes me feel a little sad.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
...Hehe.
Hahahahahahahahaha!!

The middle-aged man in front of me laughed with a voice
that sounded relieved and truly amused.

name: Gnomon
text:
M-Master?
What's so funny...?

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
No, ah, my apologies.
I just didn't expect such words
to come from your mouth.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
It seems you've made some very good "comrades"...
You too.

Master wiped his face,
then turned his gaze towards me
with a look of deep affection.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
For example, even if you were to remain in this world
and complete your mission... how would you live afterward?

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
What I want to say hasn't changed from before.
After the "rift" is closed... you
don't need to live bound by the "grimoire".

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
The "magic" inscribed in this "grimoire"
are all things that everyone in the world
will eventually be able to achieve. It will take time, though.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
That's why... I want you to think about what *you*
yourself want to do.
Precisely because I am no longer in this world.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
—You.
Find a place where you yourself
feel you want to be.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
Your life is your own.
Live in a way that you will have
no regrets.

As Master said that, his body
gradually lost its color and faded away.

name: Gnomon
text:
—?!
Master, your body...!

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
...Gnomon.
Think carefully about what is most important to you,
and find your answer.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
If it's you, with your wisdom—
No matter what choice you make,
you will surely be able to thrive.

name: Gnomon's Master
text:
So...
Even if you go to a different world,
you'll surely be fine. Live well.

name: Gnomon
text:
Master...!
Wait, Master!

name: Gnomon
text:
—Uncle!
.........
Haa, haa...

...It seems I had fallen asleep
while researching, still gripping my staff.

Was that dream something I saw naturally,
or was it "magic" shown by this staff?
...Or perhaps.

name: Gnomon
text:
My... place...
A place where I feel...
I want to be...

—This dream occurred
the night before I was to explain
how to close the "rift" to the Heroes.

Soon after that...
The collapse of the world finally began.
—I must now make a choice.

About my own place...
About my own future.
Chapter 7 - The One Who Touched Mystery

name: Monsters
text:
Gagagagah!!
Gigek, Gipyii!!

name: Monsters
text:
Gugororororo!!
Gaou, Gyaou!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Daaaaaaah!!
Get out of the way!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Yo, ha!
It's great you're livening up the finale,
but touching the performers is strictly forbidden!

name: Monsters
text:
Gigyaaaaa!!
Guah...!

name: Gnomon
text:
—! I can't believe we landed in a mountain like this.
And in a place where so many monsters
are running rampant.

options.text: Sorry, it seems like we drifted off!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not [Player]-sama's fault.
It was known that the "rift" was constantly
moving.

options.text: Oh no, we don't have much time!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Please calm down, Hero.
The limit hasn't been reached yet.
If we hurry, we should make it in time.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Barte-sama.
The flow of aura is indeed
converging ahead, isn't it?

name: Barte
text:
Yeah, no doubt about it!
The spreading flow is
narrowing down beyond this point...!

name: Barte
text:
If the destination of this aura is truly
the location of the "rift"...
Then our destination is just ahead!

Barte's gaze, which had been fixed on the sky,
suddenly shifted to the cutlass
wielded by Hydoor.

name: Barte
text:
...Whoa, Hydoor!
Lend me that cutlass for a sec!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Huh? What is it, Barte?
I'm busy right now, if you want to check
the sword's condition, do it later—

name: Barte
text:
No, it'll be over in a second!
...Considering the characteristics of these monsters
and the durability of this blade—

Barte's hand touched Hydoor's cutlass.
Then, Hydoor's cutlass began to glow.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
—?!
W-What?!
What did you do?!

name: Barte
text:
...That should do it!
You've been at the forefront,
slashing at monsters non-stop, haven't you?

name: Barte
text:
So, I strengthened it a bit and sharpened it
to make it cut better! Try it,
it should be easier to handle!

name: Barte
text:
—Well, it's more accurate to say I superimposed
an image of a sword I forged.
It should be effective for a while!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
You're amazing, you...!
I owe you one, Barte!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Alright, then I'll rampage to my heart's content
and clear the path for us!!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Hey, Hydoor, are you sure about your stamina?
You've been up all night, and you've been putting on
some pretty flashy performances so far.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Hah, who are you talking to!
I used to be the most vicious pirate of Muirauka IV,
and now I'm a top athlete in cosmic swimming!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
That's who I am!
I don't have the kind of stamina
that would get tired out by this!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Whoa, that's what I like to hear!
Alright, let's keep pushing through
with this flamboyant style!

name: Barte
text:
I'm going to give it my all too!
I'll show you the skills I've honed in this world,
so be prepared!

name: Gnomon
text:
...I will also fully support everyone.
And without fail...
I will fulfill my role and show you.

options.text: The finish line is almost there!
Let's keep pushing until the very end!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Roger that, boss!
Let's show everyone in the world—
what true "hope" is!!

The group fought hard,
cooperating with each other,
defeating a tremendous number of monsters,
and hurrying onward.

After clearing countless monsters...
Around the time they started to forget how many.

—Finally.
The location appeared.

—They arrived at a desolate plateau
overlooking a sea of clouds in the distance.

However, that place, which should have felt beautiful,
was filled with an ominous atmosphere.

The sky was greatly cracked, stained red,
and would no longer return to normal.

However, there were no monsters
that had been endlessly present there just moments ago—

The whistling wind and
the distant sound of rumbling earth
dominated the surroundings.

options.text: This is... the location of the "rift"?
It's like the commotion from before was all just a lie.

name: Gnomon
text:
—The map can't display properly.
It might be that everything has already been
devoured by the monsters.

name: Barte
text:
...Yeah. As I thought...
The aura is flowing as if it's being sucked
into that crack-like place.

name: Barte
text:
Or rather... ugh.
If I keep looking at it, I feel like
something's going to happen. It's a really strange color.

name: Gnomon
text:
...That's enough.
Thank you very much,
Barte-sama.

[Player] also looked up at the sky.
In the center of the dark red sky.
Cracks like shattered glass.

—Towards it,
the transparent "chain" they saw then
stretched straight.

options.text: If we follow this... can we go home?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
...It's finally starting, isn't it?
[Player]'s... no.
Our final job.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Ah... if that crack
is where the "rift" is exposed—

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Then we observe the "rift" through there,
go outside the universe, and close the "rift".
...And then, a moving ending.

Gnomon looked up at the sky with a somewhat uneasy... no.
A wishful expression.

options.text: Are you ready for the last one?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Oh, I apologize.
I was just thinking a little.
—I'm fine.

Gnomon re-gripped his staff,
and one after another, he inserted
material coins into the staff's coin slot.

name: Gnomon
text:
...[Player]-sama.
Before we start, I'd like to confirm the procedure.

name: Gnomon
text:
First, from now,
I will use the "magic" to strengthen the usual observation
directionality on you.

name: Gnomon
text:
You will then rely on that
to observe the Ether pump cluster.

The staff began to emit a strong light—
Preparing itself perfectly to unleash "magic".

name: Gnomon
text:
As soon as I finish casting the "magic" on you,
I will cast the "magic" to temporarily stop the Ether pump.

name: Gnomon
text:
If the method is correct... with that,
the membrane of the Ether pump will collapse,
and the "rift" hole will open wide.

name: Gnomon
text:
From there, escape to outside the universe.
Then observe the "rift" from the outside and close it—
And connect the path back to the original world.

name: Gnomon
text:
...It will consume an enormous cost,
so I believe we'll only have one chance.
Please, I ask for your cooperation.

name: Gnomon
text:
Then... let's begin.
—Cost 15.
Observation directionality correction, 300 seconds.

The staff, pointed at [Player],
illuminated the view with a strong light.

[Player] focused all their senses
on what was ahead—
Attempting to observe the Ether pump cluster.

Focusing their vision
as if heading towards a single point...
the center of the crack in the sky.

—However. Their sight, their hearing.
All their senses were shaken
as if being pushed back by a strong force.

They desperately tried to resist—
But "something" was interfering,
making it difficult to push back.

name: Gnomon
text:
Please, endure...!
—Thank you for waiting,
here I come!

name: Gnomon
text:
Cost 256...
Ether pump operation authority, forced acquisition—
Completed, login confirmed.

name: Gnomon
text:
From administrator, command to all units!
Ether pump—
Cease operation!!

Swinging his strongly glowing staff,
Gnomon unleashed a single ray of light
towards the sky.

The light, extending with tremendous speed,
hit the center of the crack,
creating ripples in the sky.

The ripples spread to every corner of the sky,
and the sky once emitted a strong flash.
And then—
[Player] fell down on their back.

It was as if—
Something that had been strongly pulling was
suddenly completely pulled out.

—And.
When they opened their eyes again...

In the cracked sky,
a large hole opened,
connecting to a jet black space.

It was as if a giant pane of glass
that had covered the sky had shattered,
with sharp edges along its perimeter—

With countless transparent fragments drifting around it.
It stood gaping open.

name: Barte
text:
Th-that was a huge sound, but...
What was that?!
Glass...!?

name: Gnomon
text:
—Success!
The Ether pump's membrane is broken...
and the "rift" is now directly visible!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
U-whoa... so that's it.
It's a really strange color...
it's so unsettling it doesn't even feel real.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
This is quite huge...
It reminds me of that big hole that opened up
in the sky above Osaka.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
So, those glass-like fragments drifting around it,
are the remnants of the Ether pump?

name: Gnomon
text:
That's right. It has stopped operating now,
and its bonds have broken, beginning to collapse.

name: Gnomon
text:
...However, the ceasing operation command
won't last long. While this state
is maintained—

name: Gnomon
text:
We must go outside the universe.
...Since the hole is open in the sky,
using flight "magic" is essential.

Saying that, Gnomon re-gripped his staff, which he had lowered once,
and began inserting coins again.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Please gather in one place.
From now on, using "magic"—
I will transport everyone to the boundary of the universe.

options.text: Thank you for everything so far, Gnomon.

name: Gnomon
text:
...
...What are you saying?
Ah, no. My choice of words were poor, weren't they?

name: Gnomon
text:
—I will also go with you.
Therefore, I would like you to gather in one place
to make it easier to cast the "magic".

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
...!?
H-Hey, you were agonizing so much about it yesterday!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Seriously, you...
Are you really okay with that!?

name: Gnomon
text:
...It's a conclusion I reached after much thought.
The time until the Ether pump restarts is unpredictable here.

name: Gnomon
text: If it restarts, another ceasing operation command must be issued before the self-repair happens.

name: Gnomon
text:
Furthermore... to continue casting "magic" to ensure everyone's safety
while inferring the environment at the boundary of the universe—

name: Gnomon
text:
Quite precise calculations are required.
It's more efficient for me to accompany you
and cast "magic" while observing the surroundings.

name: Barte
text:
That might be true, but...
But if you do that, you might not be able to return to this universe, right?

name: Barte
text:
This world...
Your homeland.
Is it really okay if you can't return?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Please rest assured.
I have no family to begin with.
So there's no need to worry.

name: Gnomon
text:
We also don't know what awaits us outside the path.
If monsters were waiting...

name: Gnomon
text:
I believe it's better to have even one more combatant.
There are still many "magic" spells prepared
to counter the "rift".

name: Gnomon
text:
My mission will finally end
when I use them up with all my might.
So, it's fine.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
—! You, you...!
Giving in so easily...!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—Stop it, Hy-kun.
This is Gnomon's answer, reached after much careful thought
with little time.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
As intelligent as he is...
He's come to this conclusion after preparing himself for many things—
isn't that right?
Gnomon nodded silently to Danzo's question.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
...Yet, if you shake his resolve
by asking if it's really okay,
his determination might waver.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
The situation is urgent.
...Let's face it together.

Hydoor looked down.
Barte's, Danzo's.
And Gnomon's gazes were fixed on [Player].

The party...
awaited the answer of [Player],
the "Hero".

options.text: Gnomon, I want you to come with us.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Thank you, [Player]-sama.
I will fulfill my mission until the very end.

Gnomon smiled faintly.
And, having finished inserting the coins,
he readied his staff, which emitted a strong glow.

name: Gnomon
text:
—My "magic" can only move us
as far as that exposed boundary of the universe,
where physical distance can be calculated.

name: Gnomon
text:
To exit from there...
I will need to borrow [Player]-sama's
observation ability.

options.text: So that's where I need to help out, right?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Preparation is complete.
Now, let us go.
—Cost, 128.

Rings of light began to float
around the group member's bodies,
spinning rapidly.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Coordinates, confirmed.
Movement, open...

name: Gnomon
text:
—!?
Whoa—!?

Just as Gnomon was about to finish his incantation...
An even greater tremor shook the ground.
And then—

An indescribable... yet.
A primordial roar that instilled fear
resounded throughout the entire area.

options.text: A huge tremor... and a huge sound!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Whoa, whoa, just when we were about to go...!
What the hell is going on!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
...Wait.
What is that...

Danzo pointed at
the "rift" that had opened in the sky.
A space that looked like it was painted jet black.

—From there.
Something with an inorganic color,
a sharp tip began to emerge.

It slowly revealed itself,
making a creaking sound as if it were
grinding the atmosphere.

—And then. It stopped at a position
that perfectly blocked the "rift".
And roared again.

It was an utterly massive anomaly,
shaped like a cone, slowly rotating far above.

Neither artificial nor living.
Simply a mechanism to pose a threat
to all existence in this world...

To the "Observer", it appeared that way.
And... the "Observer" had an idea
of what such an existence was.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
—Huh, what!?
You're kidding, that giant thing
that looks like it could devour a whole planet, is a monster!?

name: Barte
text:
...Yeah, I think so.
I don't feel any life force from it.
Rather—

name: Barte
text:
It's sucking up all the life force around it.
Only monsters do something like that.

name: Gnomon
text:
.........
Could that possibly be...
The obstacle that has hindered the pioneers...?

name: Gnomon
text:
Numerous "Heroes" must have challenged it...
Is that the reason why there are almost no records left behind...?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
A defense mechanism that confronts
those who try to close the "rift"... something like that?
Even so, isn't it too big...?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
—Wait a minute!
Isn't that thing scattering something!?

The giant conical monsters was rotating like a sprinkler,
scattering what looked like particles.

It was too far away to see in detail with the naked eye.
However—

The presence emitted by the monsters
was certainly diffusing and spreading.
[Player] sensed its true nature.

name: Barte
text:
Whoa, whoa, you're kidding me...!
If that's the case, then there's a ridiculous number of them!
To defeat all of those...!

name: Gnomon
text:
...It's over.
At this rate, the lifespan of this world.
It will shrink further... and end.

Gnomon's face twitched in terror.
His hand gripping the staff trembled slightly.

options.text: What should we do about this...?

name: Gnomon
text:
—!
[Player]-sama...

name: Gnomon
text:
...That's right.
I am here to support the Hero,
and to guide them...!

He shook his head and re-gripped his staff.
He thought for a few seconds... then asked [Player].

name: Gnomon
text:
...[Player]-sama.
As you know... having a complete countermeasure
against monsters is not very realistic.

name: Gnomon
text:
Dealing with that giant monster, which is the source,
is what I believe should be the first move.

name: Gnomon
text:
Is it possible to—
shut that monster out
of this world?

[Player] observed the "rift" again,
through the giant monster.

It seemed certain that the "rift" had spread
far beyond the cracked sky,
to the outer boundary.

However, the slight opening made to observe it now
was completely blocked by that monster.

The immense body of the monster was perceived as strong noise,
not allowing one to grasp what lays beyond.

options.text: If we could narrow that path from here...

text:
[Player] tried to delve their perception further
beyond the noise emitted by the monsters. However...

What they saw there was—
That entity, seen sometime before, that took on a form
as if clad in armor.

That entity that unleashed slashes
that seemed to paint the world white.

The eye-like part of that entity
seemed to twitch, and—
[Player] instinctively recoiled.

Their vision completely returned to their original position.
Whether it was natural fear or not,
their body was drenched in sweat.

name: Gnomon
text:
...[Player]-sama!
What's wrong?
Are you alright!?

Why that armored anomaly
was seen, was unknown, but
a response to the question could be given.

[Player], while steadying their ragged breath,
first responded to the question
posed by Gnomon.

options.text: ...That one, we can't shut it out.
Unless we see the entire "rift", it's impossible.

name: Gnomon
text:
...I see. Thank you.
Then, as expected...
We need to engage in combat, don't we?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
...Well, I guess it comes to that.
Because, no matter how you look at it,
that guy is in the way.

name: Barte
text:
Are we really... going to do this?
Can we really cut through such a huge monster?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
It's not about whether we can, it's about doing it.
You said you'd forge the best blade to save this world, didn't you?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
If not now, when would you forge it?
Let's cut that giant thing in half, together.

name: Barte
text:
Ah... Ah, you're right...!
My apologies, for someone like me, I said something weak.

name: Barte
text:
...I'll do it.
I'll forge the best blade that can cut through that giant thing!

name: Gnomon
text:
—Even if we can't defeat it,
it's enough if we can just push it back.
Anyway, to get outside the universe...

name: Gnomon
text:
If we can just create a gap around that monsters
that we can pass through.
We should be able to shut out the "rift" itself.

Gnomon urged everyone to gather in one place again.
And then, he readied his staff.

The staff began to emit a strong light—
And around [Player] and the others,
the rings of light reappeared, spinning rapidly.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Then... we will fly to the boundary of the universe
where that monsters is.
...Are you prepared?

Gnomon nodded,
closed his eyes, and began to chant.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Cost 128.
Coordinates confirmed, environment fixed.

name: Gnomon
text:
...Movement, start.
Ascend!!

The rings of light became a translucent sphere
that enveloped [Player] and the others, spreading
large, rainbow-colored wings around them.

And then—
They began to ascend with tremendous speed.

The ground grew distant, and the red-stained
landscape of the world began to be seen from above.
Even that grew smaller and smaller.

And, towards their destination.
As they approached the giant monsters—

name: Bird-type Monster
text:
Gigyaaa!!
Gyagyagya!!

name: Bird-type Monster
text:
Guaaa!!
Gagaga!!

Some of the falling monsters
flew towards [Player] and the others
at high speed.

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Leave it to me!
Haa!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Whoa, there!!
Don't get in our way!!

—Hydoor and Danzo met them head-on,
and the monsters vanished into light.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Whoa, we've gotta clear the way properly!
We'll get devoured before we even fight that thing!

name: Gnomon
text:
...I apologize, no matter what route we take,
evasion is no longer possible.
...I will take as many safety measures as possible, though.

name: Barte
text:
No worries, don't you worry about me or [Player]!
Just focus on moving forward!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Yeah! We can't kick the bucket
when the boss' waiting in the back!
Leave it to us!!

options.text: The main event is yet to come, right...!?

name: Gnomon
text:
...Master, ancestors.
Please, I beg you. Safely deliver us to that place...!

Gnomon poured his prayers into the "magic"
that had been passed down through generations.

The wings of light, flapping powerfully—
Carried the group even higher into the sky.
Taking them towards space.

—And so, they arrived at
the boundary between the sky and space.
Directly above them was the giant monster.

name: Gnomon
text:
...[Player]-sama.
Can you identify the location of the monster's core?

options.text: ...No good, the noise is too severe.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gnomon
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-sama...?
Hmm, so it's still difficult, is that correct?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
—Hah, excellent.
If we can't find the core,
we'll just peel off its outer skin.

name: Barte
text:
Leave the blades to me.
If I forge a weapon that can work against a giant like this,
it'll add prestige to my name.

name: Gnomon
text:
...To ensure the enemy is directly in front of us,
I will rewrite the laws of gravity within this adjustment sphere.

name: Gnomon
text:
It cannot be maintained for a long time.
...Let's go for a quick decisive battle.

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
...Alright, everyone's ready.
Including... me, of course.
Now, it's all up to the boss's instructions.

name: Gnomon
text:
[Player]-sama... Hero.
Please—I ask for your operation
in this final battle.

options.text: We will absolutely repel this thing!!

name: Everyone
text: Ohhhhh!

—Thus.
As the people living in the "Endangered World"
watched, pouring their prayers into it...

The "Hero" party's final battle,
with the fate of the world at stake,
began.

name: Gnomon
text:
—Here we go!
Cost 99, spell deployment...
Gravity, invert!!
Battle Start

note:
The following text is displayed right inside the battle,
so for the best experience, I'd recommend opening the game right beside it!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Whoa...!?
What is this, the world just flipped upside down!?

name: Gnomon
text: It's not the world, but we who flipped upside down, Hydoor-sama.

name: Gnomon
text:
The adjustment sphere has been expanded as much as possible.
This means you can move freely in all directions.
Now... everyone, go all out!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
All right!!
The sound seems to resonate well, I'm totally ready to go!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Audience worldwide!
Burn this into your eyes and ears!
The last number I'm dedicating to you is about to begin!!

name: Barte
text:
This thing is still devouring aura...
Just how big does it plan to get?
It makes me shiver just thinking about it.

name: Barte
text:
—But, there's nothing in this world that my blade can't cut open!
I'll prove that right now!!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
If I cut you down, this world will be saved.
It's my mission before returning to our original world;
I'll fulfill that obligation.

name: Gnomon
text:
......To close the "Rift",
our clan has continuously researched "magic",
and developed countermeasures for thousands of years.

name: Gnomon
text:
I will unleash the crystallization of that wisdom—
without reservation.
Please... be prepared!
Trigger condition: End of Turn 2

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Whoa—!
It's really as hard as it looks, this guy!
And it keeps spitting out monsters!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
—Tch!
Even with a frontal assault,
we can't peel off its shell and expose the core!?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
If this guy had a mouth or gills like a fish,
I could aim for those and finish it in one shot, but...!

name: Gnomon
text:
Mouth or gills... points of energy intake.
The aura of living beings is constantly flowing towards this individual...

name: Gnomon
text:
―That's it!
If there's an inflow point in the aura flow,
there's a high possibility that its defense there is weak, isn't there!?

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Oh, I see!!
Indeed, if it really has a mouth,
we can shove our weapons in there and reach the core—

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Even if not, we might be able to estimate
the core's position from the direction of the aura flow!
―Barte-chan, can you do it!?

name: Barte
text:
O-Oh, yeah!!!
I just need to find where the aura is flowing, right...!?

name: Barte
text:
With this much aura concentrated,
I don't know if I can pinpoint the location...
But I'll give it a try!!

name: Barte
text:
―Ugh!
What a sight...
I'm seriously dizzy...!

name: Barte
text:
But... I see it!!
There are several places where aura is flowing into the cracks in its shell!

name: Danzo (Travelers)
text:
Wow, Gnomon-kun, that's brilliant!
That means, that's this guy's "mouth", right!?

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
If it has a mouth, that makes things quicker!
If we aim for that and slash, we can drag out the core!

name: Hydoor (Travelers)
text:
Barte, tell us the location!!
Let's all—hit that spot with full force!!
